messages.message:
Brian
hmmm, strange.

I'm taking her to a movie tomorrow I think. If she thinks it's inappropriate for it to be the two of us, I'll invite group members. But something tells me she doesn't mind.
And in that case, neither do I.

Brian
if you don't know the guy, i approve.  if it was one of our personal friends i would be disappointed.  that was my feeling when I hooked up with Crystal.  if you don't have the balls to hold on to your girlfriend you don't deserve her.  lesson learned.

You would be disappointed in me?
I'm confused.

Brian
ACK, there must be one after June, I will be out of town.
Yeah, if it was someone in the group, like if Carl tried to take Jessie away from Mike, I would be disappointed in both of them really.
what?
Oh, Kim texted me.
she said, "you should come over if you want" followed by "no drug talk though"
I think she cared more about me not talking about it than I do about doing drugs.
Sounds like a fair trade, as long as it's only the talk she doesn't want.

Brian
OMG, she isn't interesting enough or a good enough conversationalist to talk about anything else.  She asked told me not to smoke or she wouldn't hang out with me anymore.  She expected me to respect her when she said "I go to Scottsdale to hunt for guys" while we were on a date, but she doesn't respect that I want to have a smoke and relax after work.

Brian
anyways, good talk.  we should do this more often and maybe talk less about irritating women.
Great minds discuss ideas. Average minds discuss events. Small minds discuss people.
eleanor roosevelt

Test
Test 2

Yes.
But if we specify that women are objects...
And I warned you about Kim.
Hey! What's new?

Brian
nm
got new books
playing with legos a lot
I have so many fucking legos

That sounds awesome actually. Purpose or goal in mind?
I've mostly finished the cryptography book you lent me.
Fascinating stuff. It's a much more complicated subject than I thought, and there are many attacks I had never even considered.

Brian
did you ever finish Microserfs?
yeah, I need to read more.
I bought the pickup artist book
No, it's next on my pile. I read a third of it, but the cryptography book got pushed ahead because of which book I had with me on some random trip at some point.

Brian
right
I need to read more
and watch less TV

Brian
How are you?
did you see the flame war I started?
Lots of good information there.

Good. You?
No. Where?

Brian
excellent
https://www.facebook.com/bjcullinan/posts/800908845368?notif_t=feed_comment
Wow you have everybody going.

Brian
yeah hahahahaha
this is a wealth of knowledge
when are you going to come visit me?
i miss you

I was talking about possibly this weekend, and it still might happen, but with Mike's thing, Meg's birthday, and tequila sunrise, it might be difficult.
So my new plan was first weekend in November.

Brian
I get back the 6th
from the virgin islands.
You have a weekend that would be particularly good?

Brian
want to go?
Oh yeah I forgot about htat!

Brian
can you get a week off?
Possibly... When do you leave? And do I have to buy a plane ticket?

Brian
the 29th
all expenses paid
For your dad's wedding, right?

Brian
yeah
but its really just to hang out
That would be so awesome if it worked...

Brian
I will ask him tomorrow.

Brian
so what else is new?
I started working on my media server again
I am going to put up a hosted site
and make the software downloadable
working on speed issues now

I still need to see if I can get the time off of work, and make sure there's no tests in my class that week, etc. So it probably doesn't work... But it would be awesome if it did!
Cool!

Brian
tunegazelle.com
It's all PHP right?

Brian
lawl, I already made a logo of a gazelle listening to headphones
yes, PHP
and some libs
like I might use PHPs COM wrapper for windows authentication

Did you pick that name recently?
I don't think I remember it.

Brian
yeah, its new

Brian
mmm whiskey
Yeah I should have alcohol too. Then again, I should probably get off facebook and leave work.

Brian
haha yeah

K. Doing that now!
See you the weekend of 11/11/11 if not sooner!

Brian
ok!

I feel like we should commemorate that date... like 40 minutes or so before midnight.
With some sort of shindig...

Brian
that sounds fun
Oh well, not making an event now!

Brian
i will think about it
Did you call? My phone crashed. I think I need a new ROM.

Brian
I need your help understanding electronics
http://www.instructables.com/files/orig/FJA/4IZJ/GICYB5XH/FJA4IZJGICYB5XH.png
http://www.instructables.com/files/orig/FJ4/7RE1/GICYB6CI/FJ47RE1GICYB6CI.png
I don't understand what the Layer select does
Oh gees I thought it was going to be something complicated.

Brian
http://www.instructables.com/id/Led-Cube-8x8x8/step7/Cube-size-and-IO-port-requirements/
so, I think what is happening is the 64 switches are flipping on and off at 8 times the speed as the layer select
so the layer select cycles through each layer at a really fast refresh rate, and the 64 outputs 8 * 8 are flipping on and off.
but then, doesn't that mean it will be 1/8 as bright?
No, because there are pull up transistors putting enough power on the line to get full brightness even if all 8 in a line are lit up at the same time.
So, I guess my concern is, won't that ruin my plans for dimming them?
being some people are saying there is ghosting.
but then another guy prevents the ghosting using a higher amp transistor.
also fuck the latch switches, you can just imagine serial switches and no resistors in between the switch and the led.
am I correct so far?
http://www.instructables.com/id/Led-Cube-8x8x8/step29/Build-the-cube-attach-cables/
that shows the wireing
my concern is, how do I get LEDs to fade, AND not sacrifice on brightness.
oh and do this: http://www.instructables.com/files/deriv/FB5/G5M6/GTIEWSVC/FB5G5M6GTIEWSVC.MEDIUM.jpg
http://www.instructables.com/files/deriv/FUT/UGBN/GTIEWSVE/FUTUGBNGTIEWSVE.MEDIUM.jpg
also last year the Arduino was 100 bucks a pop.
I love technology.

Brian
so the layer select cycles through each layer at a really fast refresh rate, and the 64 outputs 8 * 8 are flipping on and off.
but then, doesn't that mean it will be 1/8 as bright?
No, because there are pull up transistors putting enough power on the line to get full brightness even if all 8 in a line are lit up at the same time.
So, I guess my concern is, won't that ruin my plans for dimming them?
being some people are saying there is ghosting.
but then another guy prevents the ghosting using a higher amp transistor.
also fuck the latch switches, you can just imagine serial switches and no resistors in between the switch and the led.
am I correct so far?
http://www.instructables.com/id/Led-Cube-8x8x8/step29/Build-the-cube-attach-cables/
that shows the wireing
my concern is, how do I get LEDs to fade, AND not sacrifice on brightness.
oh and do this: http://www.instructables.com/files/deriv/FB5/G5M6/GTIEWSVC/FB5G5M6GTIEWSVC.MEDIUM.jpg
http://www.instructables.com/files/deriv/FUT/UGBN/GTIEWSVE/FUTUGBNGTIEWSVE.MEDIUM.jpg
also last year the Arduino was 100 bucks a pop.
I love technology.

Sorry, got distracted. Back now.
Lemme look.

Brian
what say you?

Still looking at plans.
(I understand your question though.)
http://www.instructables.com/id/Led-Cube-8x8x8/step5/How-does-a-LED-cube-work/
So it does multiplex them. So they are at 1/8 brightness at the max.

Brian
so do you think I should do that or make a bigger circuit?
Define bigger circuit

Brian
1 output for every LED
What is your cube dimensions?

Brian
well, I am really making pants.
but I am already going to need a bigger circuit for all 3 colors
pants?

Brian
yes, I am going to make bell bottoms outlined with multicolor LEDs
Yes, basically an RGB version would be three independent blue ones superimposed on one another.

Brian
right
So, how many LED's in total?

Brian
so is there a component I should order like a 32 pin serializer chip?
possible 400 LEDs
*possibly

Wow!
So you'd need a lot of controller outputs to power all 400 directly.

Brian
yeah, I need like a serial in to 32 bit parallel out.
or 64 and I can't find one.
They exist.

Brian
all of them say 32 parallel in to serial out, that doesn't work in reverse does it?
No, I don't think so.

Brian
hmmm, I can't find it
what does this mean? http://parts.digikey.com/1/parts-datasheet/ic-shift-register-1-64bit-16-mc14557-d-on-semiconductor-datasheet
1-64 bit
16
?
oh like a buffer?
you pass in 1 to 64 numbers and it outputs it?

No, you give it a binary value and a number to shift, and it shifts the bits in the binary value that many places.
so 11110000,1 would become like 11100001 or something.

Brian
right, so what is the type of component where I pass in a value and it connects the output
?
??

Brian
Halp?

sry
fell asleep

Brian
Oh. Lol
Did i wake you?

naw
They're demultiplexers, right?

Brian
That convert serial to parallel ports?
ya  i think

Brian
ill check it out. Thanks!
i cant wait to start working on this. I am buying the arduino saturday.
Sweet. That alone is exciting!

Brian
Yeah. They are so cheap now. Last year they were like $100 a piece, now they are $20.

That's ridiculous.
ly awesome.
Gotta love the future!

Brian
Yeah. I have a ton of other art projects i want to do after this too.

No, decoder!
Demultiplexer is slightly different.

Brian
Oh sweet. Do they have them with fat amps and .5 to 7 volts?

Dunno. 
Yes for sure. But can you get oen?

Brian
hmm.
Has to be fast too.

Brian
What are the little centipede pins that fit in to a bread board called?

leads?
That's what I'd call them.

Brian
Yeah
How's the project?

Brian
haven't started, free day is Wednesday
I need to stop drinking again though.
OMG FREE DAY

Brian
I spend too much money.

There's another one?!
Not missing it this time!!!

Brian
every year
Just stop drinking at expensive bars.

Brian
last night I took a $90 cab home because Ryan ditched us.

Ryan's a dick. Why do you like that guy so much?!
He ditched you for a girl I hope...

Brian
I'm kind of an asshole too.  So we get along well.
No, he said I'm done and disappeared back to his car.
I went and got him another drink but w/e
You should move back to flag and party with us.

Brian
haha, probably not.

Well... you would have to figure out how to simultaneously be not fighting with Mike AND Jessie.
And also, Ryan's a WAY bigger asshole than you.

Brian
Honestly, I wouldn't hang out with either of them if it weren't for the things we have in common.
And Jessie is awful.  She embarrassed me in front of a lot of people.  If I had been introducing Joe Flieger and he was grabbing at my nuts in front of my new friends, I wouldn't want to hang out with him again.  That is where I am at with Jessie.
I asked her not to bring up sex as my only motivation for hanging out with Jen.  So what does she do?  She asks in front of everyone, "Can we talk or are you going to stay here and try and get some?"
At which point I was totally shut off.  I have no desire to be around her anymore.
She is miserable and negative all the time.  I deserve better.
Ryan offered to take Kelsey to the Fiesta Bowl.  So what does she do?  The day before she makes plans so go out of town, without talking to either of us.
So, I have determined I have pretty shitty/immature friends, and I am getting kind of sick of it.

hmm... yeah that's pretty awful
Jessie seems pretty consistently out to sabotage your romantic life.
And that example of Kelsey is pretty typical of her, but pretty minor IMO.

Brian
Yeah, fortunately we were able to find someone to go.  But that's still shitty, tickets aren't cheap and it is not very adult like to pull that shit.  I think a lot of our friends need to grow up.

So. I miss you! Which is why you and Jessie should make up, or figure it out amongst yourselves how I can see you.

It is my duty to not deal with your fighting with Jessie. It HAS to be you, or you two. For example, when I create a Facebook event, I will invite both of you, and both of you can come, and if one of you can't be around the other, that person can decline when the other accepts. I MUST NOT pick and choose between who to invite so that I can see one or the other.

In your most recent text, you said I have to choose. No, I must not choose. YOU have to choose! The burden of this issue is solely on you two, or whoever among you who refuses to hang out with the other.

Also, don't pretend this is bad breakup drama! Your bad breakup drama was over like a year ago. This is friends-who-are-drama-queens-and-would-be-able-to-deal-with-this-if-they-acted-like-adults drama. Not to say I'm super-mature or anything. Just to say I'm not humoring this. Which isn't really related to the above.

I miss you! I want you to go camping, and go to crazy parties with you at defcon! But I also want to do those things with Jessie. And it isn't up to me to figure out who gets to go and who doesn't; that's you two.

Oh, what's my position on failed relationships?

Brian
I understand, we'll talk soon.

Brian
I am still ahead of my time.  I can discover new knowledge faster than I can use it.  I need your help.  Any questions?

Brian
I know why you waiting until now and I will save you!

Brian
I completely lost my mind last week and went to like 55 hours of therapy. I realized you were a really great friend to me for a long time and never did anything wrong. Could perl be formed and used as both server language and JavaScript?

Brian
Sorry my robot got out of hand, I am still repairing.

You did have us pretty worried there... There was much discussion of what we could do to help.
Travis said he saw you recently!

Brian
I knew that would work because I already wrote it down.
You had a discussion? What did I do? I can't remember. Anything we need to delete? Who else?
I need your help.
K. How can I help?

Brian
I have been living under a rock socially for 6 years. Can perl be used on server and client/browser?

Brian
I am using a to-do list to track my ambition. I've landed 4 phone interviews, 2 that I actually wanted, 2 more in process. Expressing my emotions with my wife to overcome childhood jobs. Measuring my intake of knowledge and connecting with others on a personal level by developing trust, budgeting, validation, agile, science, every aspect of my life. This is my final cut.

Brian

Crystal said she did this with moderate success and I convinced her to add cleaning to the schedule.
I need you.
*childhood pains
As long as someone is speaking to me I am learning. I am sorry I took so long.

Travis looked so lost.

Brian
Interesting, you are the first person that I can find the EXACT day that I broke up with them. 5/20/2012 was your last message before I started messaging you.
Yeah, I noticed that too. Interesting, the incidental results of technology.

Brian
Woah.  That is totally something one AI would say to another AI
;D
Interesting, the incidental results of technology.
lol

Brian
We need to reboot films in the forrest.  Movies are an important part of understanding.
I can get this place as our venue: http://www.foxglovegardening.net/
Foxglove gardening
Landscaping and Gardening Services Flagstaff, Arizona
foxglovegardening.net
Interested?
That sounds awesome!

Brian
When can we meet?

Brian
This is taking too long to explain.
I love you.

Brian
I need to talk to Matthew Shanker

Brian
We should speak in person.
I've developed a test method to prove God exists.
I can explain the missing part of every persons life just by asking questions.  I'm starting to astral-project.

Brian

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Occam%27s_razor
Occam's razor - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Occam's razor (also written as Ockham's razor, and lex parsimoniae in Latin, which means law of parsimony) is a problem-solving principle attributed to William of Ockham (c. 1287–1347), who was an English Franciscan friar, scholastic philosopher and theologian. The principle can be interpreted as st...
en.wikipedia.org

Brian
lol referring to Keifer

I've convinced him that I am an AI

I don't think I'm proud of you for that, and I think I should discourage it... At best, you're harmlessly trolling your friends for no reason. At worst, you aren't functioning well enough to be able to maintain normal relationships and this might be a sign you need some sort of medical intervention...

Do you need help? How can I help?

Brian
By sending people compliments, how did this world get so messed up saying something nice to someone is a bad thing?
Thank you for caring though. I trust your wisdom. Kiefer just sent me a job application
And he's coming to visit me

Brian
How many compliments did you get?
That's good. I should come visit you too. Might have to be a few weeks from now though.

Brian
Agree
I don't know about compliments. I'm getting a lot of old friends messaging me to ask if you're okay and why you're saying strange things out of the blue.

Brian
Damnit they didn't follow instructions.
Did you expect them to? Also, do you see why they might find such an interaction odd?

Brian
Every interaction is odd on the internet
There is a spectrum.

Brian
People come here looking for a personal connection. Doesnt matter what they think of me. All that matters is they care about you.

I am glad you had a chance to talk to old friends.
I haven't heard from you in 6 years. What do I have to lose?

Brian
You did say harmless I don't agree with your use of the word troll, I am not green.
You should send kiefer a compliment.

I think it would help a lot if you try to seem as normal as possible to the friends you talk to, as opposed to so thoroughly enjoying being weird to them.
Just a suggestion.

Brian
Lol this is easier with recruiters
Lol #TheRealBrian
I've never had my own hashtag

Brian
When have I ever been normal?

Brian
Do you understand how the word troll hurts people’s feelings?  Leah and Matthew Shanker called me this all the time and I use to think they were being hateful to me.  When someone appears to be an asshole, they are projecting pain from their own lives.  For a moment, everyone I spoke to remember a part of their past so they can look forward to their future.

Brian
I love you.

Brian
https://www.generosity.com/emergencies-fundraising/send-brian-and-iga-to-tahiti-for-great-success--2/x/15204496
Send Brian and Iga to Tahiti for great success!

generosity.com
Think of all you could get done if I wasn't here to pester you

Brian
When can you come visit?

Brian
Sorry brew.  I broke my word and I am just wondering where your head is at right now.    I miss you.

Brian
Aren't you curious if I still exist?

Brian
Does a CNAME do any redirecting?
Yes, at the DNS layer. Normally, another query would be necessary after getting a cname response. Although, if the responding server knows the response to that query too, it often includes it.

Brian
Can I use it to mask another domain like us-central1-sosmethod-36e55.cloudfunctions.net?
Also, do you think this is stupid sosmethod.io?
You can't use a cname to hide a hostname from a sleuth, but it's a great way to make a simpler URL or hide a weird hostname from a layman.

Brian
Ok good enough.
I'm driving so can't look at websites, but I'll check them it later.

Brian
Ok be safe ttyl

Brian
How do we make more money with IT in Flagstaff?
I want to move.
Do you have too much work than you can handle?

Hah you totally should! It looked for a bit like I'd need to hire, but currently I'm not quite as busy as necessary to cover wages for more people. There's a lot of ups and downs.
Maybe with advertising...
